bioconda.name: bioconductor-les
bioconda.summary: Identifying Differential Effects in Tiling Microarray Data

biotools.summary: This package estimates Loci of Enhanced Significance (LES) in tiling microarray data. These are regions of regulation such as found in differential transcription, CHiP-chip, or DNA modification analysis. The package provides a universal framework suitable for identifying differential effects in tiling microarray data sets, and is independent of the underlying statistics at the level of single probes.
